title: Equinox Blue is Recruiting Coach and Manager (Pay)
body:
Due to the recent found success in the Equinox Red roster we wished to invest into a sister team that could both rival and contend for top 4 in OOL.

But no roster is complete without its handy dandy support staff.  We are currently in the middle of trials therefore attending scrim may be crucial for both roles.

To find out more about us click below:
https://www.facebook.com/EquinoxEsportsOCE/
https://twitter.com/EquinoxOCE

DM (Direct Message) us on Twitter or Facebook to get more info on the roles.

**Required of Manager**
Arranging Scrim
Arranging Subs
OOL Check In

**Required of Coach**
Pick and Ban
Strategic Coaching
Vital to have the ability to relay information
Able to structure practice (scrims)

For both Manager and Coaches there will be entry level pay at the end of the split.
Contractual obligation if they prefer.

replies.body: Hi there. I will gladly sign up. for either. how ?
